answerText: Step Brothers[10] This SNL star of Elf and Anchorman plays Brennan opposite John C. Reilly's Dale in Step Brothers.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 8 | 14 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: The two main characters in this movie bond over Good Housekeeping and John Stamos. [10] Name this movie in which Dale and Brennan build bunk beds, do karate in the garage, get into a fight with a bunch of children, and have arguments over a drum set.
